summary: This is a Sabre with high quality texture and It\'s own Sheath !
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/24502-1-1348381654.jpg[/img]

TELL ME WHAT WEAPON WOULD YOU LIKE TO HAVE IN SKYRIM,Just write it in comments (I will be making weapons that have most votes)


I always wanted to see a Sabre in Skyrim, but there was no Sabre at all, so here is my model of Sabre !

It has High quality textures and It\'s own unique sheath.
author: Shadowboy2020
